message_1: If there are 5 apples in a basket, but you don't know whether they are all red or if some are green, how many different combinations of colors are possible?
message_2:
There can be 6 different combinations of red and green apples in the basket:

1. All 5 apples are red (5R, 0G)
2. 4 apples are red and 1 is green (4R, 1G)
3. 3 apples are red and 2 are green (3R, 2G)
4. 2 apples are red and 3 are green (2R, 3G)
5. 1 apple is red and 4 are green (1R, 4G)
6. All 5 apples are green (0R, 5G)
